# epilot-role_role (Resource)

Role Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "epilot-role_role" "my_role" {
  five = {
    expires_at = "2028-07-21T17:32:28Z"
    grants = [
      {
        action = "entity-read"
        conditions = [
          {
            equals_condition = {
              attribute = "workflows.primary.task_name"
              operation = "equals"
              values = [
                "Qualification"
              ]
            }
          }
        ]
        effect   = "deny"
        resource = "entity:123:contact:f7c22299-ca72-4bca-8538-0a88eeefc947"
      }
    ]
    id              = "123:owner"
    name            = "Owner"
    organization_id = "123"
    slug            = "owner"
    type            = "...my_type..."
  }
  four = {
    expires_at = "2028-07-21T17:32:28Z"
    grants = [
      {
        action = "entity-read"
        conditions = [
          {
            equals_condition = {
              attribute = "workflows.primary.task_name"
              operation = "equals"
              values = [
                "Qualification"
              ]
            }
          }
        ]
        effect   = "allow"
        resource = "entity:123:contact:f7c22299-ca72-4bca-8538-0a88eeefc947"
      }
    ]
    id              = "123:owner"
    name            = "Owner"
    organization_id = "123"
    partner_org_id  = "123"
    slug            = "owner"
    type            = "...my_type..."
  }
  one = {
    expires_at = "2028-07-21T17:32:28Z"
    grants = [
      {
        action = "entity-read"
        conditions = [
          {
            equals_condition = {
              attribute = "workflows.primary.task_name"
              operation = "equals"
              values = [
                "Qualification"
              ]
            }
          }
        ]
        effect   = "deny"
        resource = "entity:123:contact:f7c22299-ca72-4bca-8538-0a88eeefc947"
      }
    ]
    id              = "123:owner"
    name            = "Owner"
    organization_id = "123"
    slug            = "owner"
    type            = "...my_type..."
  }
  three = {
    expires_at = "2028-07-21T17:32:28Z"
    grants = [
      {
        action = "entity-read"
        conditions = [
          {
            equals_condition = {
              attribute = "workflows.primary.task_name"
              operation = "equals"
              values = [
                "Qualification"
              ]
            }
          }
        ]
        effect   = "allow"
        resource = "entity:123:contact:f7c22299-ca72-4bca-8538-0a88eeefc947"
      }
    ]
    id              = "123:owner"
    name            = "Owner"
    organization_id = "123"
    slug            = "owner"
    type            = "...my_type..."
  }
  two = {
    expires_at = "2028-07-21T17:32:28Z"
    grants = [
      {
        action = "entity-read"
        conditions = [
          {
            equals_condition = {
              attribute = "workflows.primary.task_name"
              operation = "equals"
              values = [
                "Qualification"
              ]
            }
          }
        ]
        effect   = "deny"
        resource = "entity:123:contact:f7c22299-ca72-4bca-8538-0a88eeefc947"
      }
    ]
    id              = "123:owner"
    name            = "Owner"
    organization_id = "123"
    pricing_tier    = "Professional"
    slug            = "owner"
    type            = "...my_type..."
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `five` (Attributes) A role that is applied to end customers and installers using the Portals. Requires replacement if changed. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--five))
- `four` (Attributes) A role that appears in another organization's role list that can be assigned but not modified by the partner organization. Requires replacement if changed. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--four))
- `one` (Attributes) A standard user role. Must be explicitly assigned to users. Requires replacement if changed. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--one))
- `three` (Attributes) A role that can be assigned to users in other organizations for sharing purposes. Requires replacement if changed. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--three))
- `two` (Attributes) A role automatically applied to all users in an organization. Requires replacement if changed. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--two))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Format: <organization_id>:<slug>
- `name` (String) Human-friendly name for the role
- `organization_id` (String) Id of an organization
- `schemas` (Attributes) A role that is applied to end customers and installers using the Portals (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--schemas))
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly name for the role

<a id="nestedatt--five"></a>
### Nested Schema for `five`

Required:

- `grants` (Attributes List) List of grants (permissions) applied to the role. Requires replacement if changed. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--five--grants))
- `name` (String) Human-friendly name for the role. Requires replacement if changed.
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly name for the role. Requires replacement if changed.
- `type` (String) Type of the role. Requires replacement if changed.

Optional:

- `expires_at` (String) date and time then the role will expire. Requires replacement if changed.
- `id` (String) Format: <organization_id>:<slug>. Requires replacement if changed.
- `organization_id` (String) Id of an organization. Requires replacement if changed.

<a id="nestedatt--five--grants"></a>
### Nested Schema for `five.grants`

Required:

- `action` (String) Requires replacement if changed.

Optional:

- `conditions` (Attributes List) Requires replacement if changed. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--five--grants--conditions))
- `effect` (String) Default: "allow"; must be one of ["allow", "deny"]; Requires replacement if changed.
- `resource` (String) Requires replacement if changed.

<a id="nestedatt--five--grants--conditions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `five.grants.conditions`

Optional:

- `equals_condition` (Attributes) Check if attribute equals to any of the values. Requires replacement if changed. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--five--grants--conditions--equals_condition))

<a id="nestedatt--five--grants--conditions--equals_condition"></a>
### Nested Schema for `five.grants.conditions.equals_condition`

Required:

- `attribute` (String) Requires replacement if changed.
- `operation` (String) must be "equals"; Requires replacement if changed.
- `values` (List of String) Requires replacement if changed.

### Nested Schema for `schemas`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String) Human-friendly name for the role
- `organization_id` (String) Id of an organization
- `partner_org_id` (String)
- `pricing_tier` (String) The pricing tier of the organization this root role is based on
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly name for the role
- `type` (String) must be "user_role"

<a id="nestedatt--schemas--grants"></a>
### Nested Schema for `schemas.grants`

Read-Only:

- `action` (String)

Read-Only:

- `attribute` (String)
- `operation` (String) must be "equals"
- `values` (List of String)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import epilot-role_role.my_epilot-role_role "123:owner"
```
